 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחוּם‎</span> **noun [masculine]** perhaps ==intestines, bowels== (meaning and √ not wholly certain, compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl. 886, 721</sup>; from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לחם‎</span> = ***press together***, according to [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Prol. 193</sup>); — only suffix: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּלְחֻמֿם כַּגְּלָלִים‎</span> [[Zeph.1.17|Zeph 1:17]] their blood shall be poured out like water,***and their bowels like dung*** [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]-[[BDB#St|St]] (ct. [[2Sam.20.10|2Sam 20:10]]), [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>l.c.</sup> [[BDB#We|We]] ('ihr Mark'), [[BDB#Rothst|Rothst]]<sup>Kau AT</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>[[Job.20.23|Job 20:23]]</sup>; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵילָם‎</span> compare v[[Job.20.12|Job 20:12]] (to which [[BDB#Now|Now]] included); [[BDB#Now|Now]] suggests also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלֵחָם‎</span> ***and their moisture (freshness, vigour***, compare [[Deut.34.7|Deut 34:7]]); &gt; and others who render ***flesh***, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">τὰς σάρκας</span> (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flesh, meat***, see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיַמְטֵר עָלֵימוֺ בִּלְחוּמוֺ‎</span> [[Job.20.23|Job 20:23]] to fill his belly, God sendeth into him his burning anger, ***and raineth*** it ***upon him, into his*** (very) ***bowels*** [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>l.c.</sup> [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]<sup>KauAT</sup> (compare [[BDB#Di|Di]], and ***into his flesh*** [[BDB#De|De]], see above); &gt; distinguished from [[Zeph.1.17|Zeph 1:17]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] (in translation) [[BDB#Da|Da]] [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] ***his food*** (as object of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ימטר‎</span>; read then <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחְמוֺ‎</span>); [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὀδύνας</span>, whence [[BDB#Me|Me]] Sgfr <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבָלִים‎</span>, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW x, 1890, 179</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלָּהָה‎</span>; [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l.c.</sup> ***wrath***, compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***threaten***.
